单元主题:
Family and Friends

单元知识目标:
词汇：20个
句子：48个
拼读：4个
绘本：2个
__EMPTY:
词汇：
how、what、fine、he、she、who 等

句式： 
—What are you doing? 
—I am listening to music.

—He is my brother. 
—She is my sister.

—Who is this man? 
—He is Grandpa.

—How many men are there? 
—There are ten men.

m, n, hard c, short a
